node.name: telldir - get current seekpointer on a directory handle
node.description: Returns the current position of the [perlfunc:readdir|readdir()] routines on DIRHANDLE. Value may be given to [perlfunc:seekdir|seekdir()] to access a particular location in a directory. Has the same caveats about possible directory compaction as the corresponding system library routine.
node.title: perlfunc:telldir
